languages.text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} is performed against the wearer, the wearer gains +1 stack of the vengeance effect. Vengeance: the character's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of the effect.
languages.original_text: Когда против персонажа совершается {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атака по возможности{/g}, персонаж получает +1 уровень эффекта "возмездие". Возмездие: совершая атаки по возможности, персонаж наносит +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно за каждый уровень эффекта.

traits.locale_text: Attacks of opportunity deal an additional +<u>(INT bonus)</u> damage, and incoming damage from attacks of opportunity is decreased by −<u>(INT bonus)</u>.

Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} is performed against the wearer, the wearer gains +1 stack of the vengeance effect. Vengeance: the character's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of the effect.

Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} is performed against the wearer, the wearer gains +1 stack of the vengeance effect. Vengeance: the character's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of the effect.

Whenever the wearer is able to perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of vengeance. The wearer's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

Whenever the wearer is able to perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of vengeance. The wearer's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: Когда против персонажа совершается {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атака по возможности{/g}, персонаж получает +1 уровень эффекта "возмездие". Возмездие: совершая атаки по возможности, персонаж наносит +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно за каждый уровень эффекта.
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} is performed against the wearer, the wearer gains +1 stack of the vengeance effect. Vengeance: the character's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of the effect.

traits.locale_text: Когда против персонажа совершается {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атака по возможности{/g}, персонаж получает +1 уровень эффекта "возмездие". Возмездие: совершая атаки по возможности, персонаж наносит +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно за каждый уровень эффекта.
Совершая атаки по возможности, владелец наносит +<u>бонус ИНТ</u> урона дополнительно. Получаемый урон от атак по возможности уменьшается на <u>бонус ИНТ</u>.

Когда персонаж может совершить {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g}, он получает +1 уровень эффекта "возмездие". Эта атака наносит +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно.

Когда против персонажа совершается {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атака по возможности{/g}, персонаж получает +1 уровень эффекта "возмездие". Возмездие: совершая атаки по возможности, персонаж наносит +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно за каждый уровень эффекта.

languages.text: 每当装备者遭受{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}时，都会获得1层“睚眦必报”效果。 睚眦必报：每有一层此效果，此角色的借机攻击额外造成+{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} is performed against the wearer, the wearer gains +1 stack of the vengeance effect. Vengeance: the character's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of the effect.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者遭受{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}时，都会获得1层“睚眦必报”效果。 睚眦必报：每有一层此效果，此角色的借机攻击额外造成+{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
当装备者可以发动{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}时，获得1层“复仇”效果。装备者的借机攻击额外造成{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。

languages.text: Cuando el portador es objetivo de un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g}, el portador gana +1 acumulación del efecto de venganza. Venganza: los ataques de oportunidad del personaje infligen +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} por cada acumulación del efecto.
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} is performed against the wearer, the wearer gains +1 stack of the vengeance effect. Vengeance: the character's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of the effect.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador es objetivo de un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g}, el portador gana +1 acumulación del efecto de venganza. Venganza: los ataques de oportunidad del personaje infligen +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} por cada acumulación del efecto.

Cuando el portador puede lanzar un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g}, gana +1 acumulación de venganza. Los ataques de oportunidad del portador infligen +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}が使用者に対して使用されるたび、使用者はヴェンジェンス効果を+1スタック獲得する。 ヴェンジェンス：キャラクターの機会攻撃は、この効果の1スタックごとに追加で+{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} is performed against the wearer, the wearer gains +1 stack of the vengeance effect. Vengeance: the character's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of the effect.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}が使用者に対して使用されるたび、使用者はヴェンジェンス効果を+1スタック獲得する。 ヴェンジェンス：キャラクターの機会攻撃は、この効果の1スタックごとに追加で+{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を成功するたびに、ヴェンジェンスが1つ蓄積する。使用者が機会攻撃をすると、+{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6}の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。

languages.text: Wird ein {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} gegen den Träger ausgeführt, erhält der Träger +1 Stapel des Vergeltung-Effektes. Vergeltung: Die Gelegenheitsangriffe des Charakters verursachen für jeden Stapel dieses Effektes +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} is performed against the wearer, the wearer gains +1 stack of the vengeance effect. Vengeance: the character's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of the effect.

traits.locale_text: Wird ein {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} gegen den Träger ausgeführt, erhält der Träger +1 Stapel des Vergeltung-Effektes. Vergeltung: Die Gelegenheitsangriffe des Charakters verursachen für jeden Stapel dieses Effektes +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.

Immer wenn der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} ausführt, erhält er +1 Stapel Rache. Die Gelegenheitsangriffe des Trägers fügen zusätzlich +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur fait l'objet d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}, il gagne +1 cumul de l'effet Vengeance. Vengeance : les attaques d'opportunité du personnage infligent +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires pour chaque cumul de cet effet.
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} is performed against the wearer, the wearer gains +1 stack of the vengeance effect. Vengeance: the character's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of the effect.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur fait l'objet d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}, il gagne +1 cumul de l'effet Vengeance. Vengeance : les attaques d'opportunité du personnage infligent +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires pour chaque cumul de cet effet.

Lorsque l'utilisateur effectue une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}, il bénéficie de +1 cumul de Vengeance. Les attaques d'opportunité de l'utilisateur infligent +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.

Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} is performed against wearer, they gain +1 stack of vengeance.
The wearer's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} is performed against wearer, they gain +1 stack of vengeance.
The wearer's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
